text: The 10% Solution for a Healthy Life is a health book by Ray Kurzweil that suggests reducing fat intake and making other dietary changes to extend one's life expectancy so that they will likely still be alive when anti-aging, cybernetic immortality and mind uploading technologies become available. Category:Science books Category:1993 books Category:Healthy lifestyle Category:Books by Ray Kurzweil
title: The 10% Solution for a Healthy Life
